mutants.original_line: la -= start
mutants.mutated_line: la += start
mutants.code:
from math import gcd

def inters(x1, y1, x2, y2):
    return max(0, min(y1, y2) - max(x1, x2) + 1)

def max_consecutive_lucky_days(la, ra, ta, lb, rb, tb):
    shift = gcd(ta, tb)
    start = la - la % shift
    la += start
    ra -= start
    start = lb - lb % shift
    lb -= start
    rb -= start
    res = max(inters(la, ra, lb + shift, rb + shift), inters(la + shift, ra + shift, lb, rb), inters(la, ra, lb, rb))
    return res

mutants.mutated_line: ra += start

from math import gcd

def inters(x1, y1, x2, y2):
    return max(0, min(y1, y2) - max(x1, x2) + 1)

def max_consecutive_lucky_days(la, ra, ta, lb, rb, tb):
    shift = gcd(ta, tb)
    start = la - la % shift
    la -= start
    ra -= start
    start = lb - lb % shift
    lb -= start
    rb -= start
    res = max(inters(la, ra, lb + shift, rb + shift), inters(la + shift, ra * shift, lb, rb), inters(la, ra, lb, rb))
    return res
